Talk to a cat about their grooming habits and if they have any unique tricks they can teach.
Inquire with a bird about their favorite type of birdseed and if they have any songs they can sing for me.
Ask a fish about their favorite type of fish food and if they have any aquatic friends they can introduce me to.
Inquire with a horse about their favorite type of carrot and if they have any equestrian skills they can teach.
